Pinchas [mouth of brass] , the son of El’azar [God has helped] , the son of Aharon [Bright, Very High] the priest, has turned my wrath away from the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] , while he was zealous for my sake among them, that I consumed not the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] in my jealousy.
For what reason say, Behold, I give unto him my covenant of peace:

And he shall have it, and his seed after him, [even] the covenant of an everlasting priesthood; because he was zealous for his God-Elōhīm (The Living Word) [The Many Powered] , and made an atonement for the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God].
Now the name of the Israeli that was slain, [even] that was slain with the Midyani woman, [was] Zimri [My Music] , the son of Salu [Weighted] , a prince of a chief house among the Shimoni.
And the name of the Midyani woman that was slain [was] Kozbi [My Lie] , the daughter of Tzur [Rock] ; he [was] head over a people, [and] of a chief house in Midyan [Strife].
And the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) spoke unto Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] , saying,
Vex the Midyanim [Strife] , and strike them:

For they vex you with their wiles, which they have beguiled you in the matter of P’or [Cleft (split hoof; an opening, break or split)] , and in the matter of Kozbi [My Lie] , the daughter of a prince of Midyan [Strife] , their sister, which was slain in the day of the plague for P’or [Cleft (split hoof; an opening, break or split)] ’s sake.

And it came to pass after the plague, that the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) spoke unto Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] and unto El’azar [God has helped] the son of Aharon [Bright, Very High] the priest, saying,

Take the sum of all the congregation of the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] , from twenty years old and upward, throughout their fathers’ house, all that are able to go to war in Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God].
And Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] and El’azar [God has helped] the priest spoke with them in the plains of Mo’av [Seed of my Father] by Yarden [Descender] [near] Yericho [Its Moon] , saying,

[Take the sum of the people] , from twenty years old and upward; as the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) commanded Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] and the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] , which went forth out of the land of Mitzrayim [Egypt - The Narrow Place].

Re’uven [Behold a Son] , the eldest son of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] : the children of Re’uven [Behold a Son] ; Hanokh [Dedicated], [of whom comes] the family of the Hanokhi [Dedicated] : of Pallu [Distinguished] , the family of the Pallui [Distinguished Ones]:
Of Hetzron [surrounded by a wall] , the family of the Hetzroni: of Karmi [Fruitful, Noble] , the family of the Karmi.
These [are] the families of the Re’uveni [behold, a son!] : and they that were numbered of them were forty and three thousand and seven hundred and thirty.
And the sons of Pallu [Distinguished] ; ‘Eli’av [My Father is God].

And the sons of ‘Eli’av [My Father is God] ; N’mu’el [Day of God] , and Datan [belonging to a fountain] , and Aviram [My Father is Exalted] . This [is that] Datan [belonging to a fountain] and Aviram [My Father is Exalted], [which were] famous in the congregation, who strove against Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] and against Aharon [Bright, Very High] in the company of Korakh [Bald] , when they strove against the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate):

And the earth opened her mouth, and swallow (to approve, commend, accept)ed them up together with Korakh [Bald] , when that company died, what time the fire devoured two hundred and fifty men: and they became a sign.
Yet the children of Korakh [Bald] died not.

The sons of Shim’on [he who hears] after their families: of N’mu’el [Day of God] , the family of the N’mu’eli: of Yamin [Right Hand] , the family of the Yamini: of Yakhin [He will establish] , the family of the Yakhini:
Of Zerach [Rising] , the family of the Zarchi: of Sha’ul [Desired] , the family of the Sha’uli.
These [are] the families of the Shimoni, twenty and two thousand and two hundred.

The children of Gad [Good Fortune with Troublesome Effort] after their families: of Tz’fon [Treasure] , the family of the Tz’foni: of Haggi [Festive] , the family of the Haggi: of Shuni [Fortunate] , the family of the Shuni:
Of Ozni [My Hearing] , the family of the Ozni [My Hearing] : of ‘Eri [Watchful] , the family of the ‘Eri:
Of Arod, the family of the Arodi [I Shall Subdue] : of Ar’eli, the family of the Ar’eli.
These [are] the families of the children of Gad [Good Fortune with Troublesome Effort] according to those that were numbered of them, forty thousand and five hundred.
The sons of Y’hudah [Let Him (God) Be Praised] [were] Er and Onan: and Er and Onan died in the land of Kena’an [Merchant].

And the sons of Y’hudah [Let Him (God) Be Praised] after their families were; of Shelah [A Petition] , the family of the Shelani: of Partzi [Breach (breaking forth; a break; opening, inlet)] , the family of the Partzi: of Zerach [Rising] , the family of the Zarchi.
And the sons of Partzi [Breach (breaking forth; a break; opening, inlet)] were; of Hetzron [surrounded by a wall] , the family of the Hetzroni: of Hamul [Spared] , the family of the Hamuli.
These [are] the families of Y’hudah [Let Him (God) Be Praised] according to those that were numbered of them, threescore and sixteen thousand and five hundred.
[Of] the sons of Yissakhar [There Is Recompense] after their families: [of] Tola [Worm] , the family of the Tola’i: of Puvah [Splendid] , the family of the Puni:
Of Yashuv [He Will Return] , the family of the Yashuvi: of Shimron [Watch-Height] , the family of the Shimroni.
These [are] the families of Yissakhar [There Is Recompense] according to those that were numbered of them, threescore and four thousand and three hundred.

[Of] the sons of Z’vulun [Glorious Dwelling Place] after their families: of Sered [Fear] , the family of the Sardi: of Elon [Mighty] , the family of the Eloni: of Yachle’el [God Waits] , the family of the Yachle’eli.
These [are] the families of the Z’vuloni according to those that were numbered of them, threescore thousand and five hundred.
The sons of Yosef [(God) He Shall Add] after their families [were] M’nasheh [Causing to Forget] and Efrayim [Doubly Fruitful].

Of the sons of M’nasheh [Causing to Forget] : of Makhir [Sold] , the family of the Makhiri: and Makhir [Sold] begat (to be father of; be ancestor of) Gil’ad [Rocky Region] : of Gil’ad [Rocky Region] [come] the family of the Gil’adi.
These [are] the sons of Gil’ad [Rocky Region]: [of] Ee’ezr [No Help] , the family of the Ee’ezri: of Helek [Portion] , the family of the Helki:
And [of] Asri’el [I Shall Be a Prince with God] , the family of the Asri’eli: and [of] Sh’khem [Shoulder] , the family of the Shikhmi:
And [of] Sh’mida [Wise] , the family of the Shemida’i: and [of] Hefer [A Well] , the family of the Hefri.

And Tz’lof’chad [First-Born] the son of Hefer [A Well] had no sons, but daughters: and the names of the daughters of Tz’lof’chad [First-Born] [were] Machlah [Disease] , and No’ah [Motion] , Hoglah [Partidge] , Machlah [Queen] , and Tirtzah [Favourable].
These [are] the families of M’nasheh [Causing to Forget] , and those that were numbered of them, fifty and two thousand and seven hundred.

These [are] the sons of Efrayim [Doubly Fruitful] after their families: of Shutelach [Noise of Breaking] , the family of the Shutelachi: of Bakher [Young Camel] , the family of the Bakhri: of Tachan [Camp] , the family of the Tachani.
And these [are] the sons of Shutelach [Noise of Breaking] : of ‘Eran [Watcher] , the family of the ‘Erani.

These [are] the families of the sons of Efrayim [Doubly Fruitful] according to those that were numbered of them, thirty and two thousand and five hundred. These [are] the sons of Yosef [(God) He Shall Add] after their families.

The sons of Binyamin [Son of the Right Hand/Strength] after their families: of Bela [Destruction] , the family of the Bela’i: of Ashbel [Fire of Bel] , the family of the Ashbeli: of Achiram [Brother of Mother] , the family of the Achirai [Brother of Mother]:
Of Sh’fufam [Serpent] , the family of the Shufami: of Hufam [Coast-man] , the family of the Hufami.

And the sons of Bela [Destruction] were Ard [I shall Subdue] and Na’aman [Pleasantness] : [of Ard [I shall Subdue] ], the family of the Ardi: [and] of Na’aman [Pleasantness] , the family of the Na’ami.
These [are] the sons of Binyamin [Son of the Right Hand/Strength] after their families: and they that were numbered of them [were] forty and five thousand and six hundred.
These [are] the sons of Dan [Judge] after their families: of Shucham [Pit-digger] , the family of the Shuchami. These [are] the families of Dan [Judge] after their families.
All the families of the Shuchami, according to those that were numbered of them, [were] threescore and four thousand and four hundred.

[Of] the children of Asher [Happy] after their families: of Yimnah [Right Hand] , the family of the Yimnah: of Yishvi [He Resembles Me] , the family of the Yishvi: of B’ri’i [With a Friend] , the family of the B’ri’i.
Of the sons of B’ri’i [With a Friend] : of Hever [Friend/Comrade] , the family of the Hevri: of Malki’el [My King is God] , the family of the Malki’eli.
And the name of the daughter of Asher [Happy] [was] Serach [The Prince Breathed].
These [are] the families of the sons of Asher [Happy] according to those that were numbered of them; [who were] fifty and three thousand and four hundred.
[Of] the sons of Naftali [My Wrestling] after their families: of Yachtze’el [God Divides] , the family of the Yachtze’eli: of Guni [My Defender] , the family of the Guni:
Of Yitzer [Forming] , the family of the Yetzri: of Shillem [Repaid] , the family of the Shillemi.
These [are] the families of Naftali [My Wrestling] according to their families: and they that were numbered of them [were] forty and five thousand and four hundred.
These [were] the numbered of the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] , six hundred thousand and a thousand seven hundred and thirty.
And the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) spoke unto Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] , saying,
Unto these the land shall be divided for an inheritance according to the number of names.
To many you i shall give the more inheritance, and to few you i shall give the less inheritance: to every one shall his inheritance be given according to those that were numbered of him.
Yet the land shall be divided by lot: according to the names of the tribes of their fathers they shall inherit.
According to the lot shall the possession thereof be divided between many and few.

And these [are] they that were numbered of the Levi’im (Levites) [Joined to] after their families: of Gershon [Exile] , the family of the Gershuni [Exiled Ones] : of K’hat [assembly, congregation] , the family of the K’hati: of M’rari [Bitter] , the family of the M’rari.

These [are] the families of the Levi’im (Levites) [Joined to] : the family of the Livni [White Ones] , the family of the Khevroni, the family of the Machli, the family of the Mushi, the family of the Korchi. And K’hat [assembly, congregation] begat (to be father of; be ancestor of) ‘Amram [exalted people].

And the name of ‘Amram [exalted people] ’s wife [was] Yokheved [Jehovah is Glory] , the daughter of Levi (Levite) [Adhesion, Joiner] , whom [her mother] bore to Levi (Levite) [Adhesion, Joiner] in Mitzrayim [Egypt - The Narrow Place] : and she bore unto ‘Amram [exalted people] Aharon [Bright, Very High] and Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] , and Miryam [rebellion] their sister.
And unto Aharon [Bright, Very High] was born Nadav [Generous] , and Avihu [he is my father] , El’azar [God has helped] , and Itamar [Coast of Palms].
And Nadav [Generous] and Avihu [he is my father] died, when they offered strange fire before the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate).

And those that were numbered of them were twenty and three thousand, all males from a month old and upward: for they were not numbered among the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] , because there was no inheritance given them among the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God].

These [are] they that were numbered by Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] and El’azar [God has helped] the priest, who numbered the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] in the plains of Mo’av [Seed of my Father] by Yarden [Descender] [near] Yericho [Its Moon].

But among these there was not a man of them whom Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] and Aharon [Bright, Very High] the priest numbered, when they numbered the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] in the wilderness of Sinai.

For the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) had said of them, They shall surely die in the wilderness. And there was not left a man of them, save Kalev [Dog] the son of Y’funeh [He Will Face] , and Y’hoshua [Yehovah is Salvation] the son of Nun [Posterity].

Then came the daughters of Tz’lof’chad [First-Born] , the son of Hefer [A Well] , the son of Gil’ad [Rocky Region] , the son of Makhir [Sold] , the son of M’nasheh [Causing to Forget] , of the families of M’nasheh [Causing to Forget] the son of Yosef [(God) He Shall Add] : and these [are] the names of his daughters; Machlah [Disease] , No’ah [Motion] , and Hoglah [Partidge] , and Machlah [Queen] , and Tirtzah [Favorable].

And they stood before Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] , and before El’azar [God has helped] the priest, and before the princes and all the congregation, [by] the door of the tabernacle of the congregation, saying,

Our father died in the wilderness, and he was not in the company of them that gathered themselves together against the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) in the company of Korakh [Bald] ; but died in his own sin, and had no sons.
Why should the name of our father be done away from among his family, because he has no son? Give unto us [therefore] a possession among the brethren of our father.
And Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] brought their cause before the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate).
And the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) spoke unto Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] , saying,

The daughters of Tz’lof’chad [First-Born] speak right: you i shall surely give them a possession of an inheritance among their father’s brethren; and you i shall cause the inheritance of their father to pass unto them.
And you i shall speak unto the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] , saying, If a man die, and have no son, then you 2f shall cause his inheritance to pass unto his daughter.
And if he have no daughter, then you 2f shall give his inheritance unto his brethren.
And if he have no brethren, then you 2f shall give his inheritance unto his father’s brethren.

And if his father have no brethren, then you 2f shall give his inheritance unto his kinsman that is next to him of his family, and he shall possess it: and it shall be unto the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] a statute of judgment, as the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) commanded Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters].

And the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) said unto Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] , Get you i up into this mount ‘Avarim [Regions Beyond] , and see the land which I have given unto the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God].
And when you i have seen it, you i also shall be gathered unto you i people, as Aharon [Bright, Very High] you i brother was gathered.

For you 2f rebelled against my commandment in the desert of Tzin [Flat] , in the strife of the congregation, to sanctify (make holy; set apart for God’s use) me at the water before their eyes: that [is] the water of M’rivah [Arguing] in Kadesh [Holy] in the wilderness of Tzin [Flat].
And Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] spoke unto the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) , saying,
Let the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) , the God-Elōhīm (The Living Word) [The Many Powered] of the spirits of all flesh, set a man over the congregation,

Which may go out before them, and which may go in before them, and which may lead them out, and which may bring them in; that the congregation of the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) be not as sheep which have no shepherd.

And the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) said unto Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] , Take you i Y’hoshua [Yehovah is Salvation] the son of Nun [Posterity] , a man in whom [is] the spirit, and lay you i hand upon him;
And set him before El’azar [God has helped] the priest, and before all the congregation; and give him a charge in their sight.
And you i shall put [some] of you i honour upon him, that all the congregation of the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] may be obedient.

And he shall stand before El’azar [God has helped] the priest, who shall ask [counsel] for him after the judgment of Urim [Lights] before the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) : at his word shall they go out, and at his word they shall come in, [both] he, and all the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] with him, even all the congregation.

And Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] did as the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) commanded him: and he took Y’hoshua [Yehovah is Salvation] , and set him before El’azar [God has helped] the priest, and before all the congregation:
And he laid his hands upon him, and gave him a charge, as the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) commanded by the hand of Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters].
And the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) spoke unto Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] , saying,

Command the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] , and say unto them, My offering, [and] my bread for my sacrifices made by fire, [for] a soothing aroma unto me, shall you 2f observe to offer unto me in their due season.

And you i shall say unto them, This [is] the offering made by fire which you 2f shall offer unto the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) ; two lambs of the first year without spot day by day, [for] a continual burnt offering.
The one lamb shall you i offer in the morning, and the other lamb shall you i offer at even;
And a tenth [part] of an eifah of flour for a meat offering, mingled with the fourth [part] of an hin [a quart] of beaten oil.
[It is] a continual burnt offering, which was ordained in mount Sinai for a soothing aroma, a sacrifice made by fire unto the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate).

And the drink offering thereof [shall be] the fourth [part] of an hin [a quart] for the one lamb: in the holy [place] shall you i cause the strong wine to be poured unto the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) [for] a drink offering.

And the other lamb shall you i offer at even: as the meat offering of the morning, and as the drink offering thereof, you i shall offer [it] , a sacrifice made by fire, of a soothing aroma unto the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate).
And on the Shabbat [Rest] day two lambs of the first year without spot, and two tenth deals of flour [for] a meat offering, mingled with oil, and the drink offering thereof:
[This is] the burnt offering of every Shabbat [Rest] , beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.
And in the beginnings of your months you 2f shall offer a burnt offering unto the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) ; two young bullocks, and one ram, seven lambs of the first year without spot;
And three tenth deals of flour [for] a meat offering, mingled with oil, for one bullock; and two tenth deals of flour [for] a meat offering, mingled with oil, for one ram;

And a several tenth deal of flour mingled with oil [for] a meat offering unto one lamb; [for] a burnt offering of a soothing aroma, a sacrifice made by fire unto the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate).

And their drink offerings shall be half an hin [a quart] of wine unto a bullock, and the third [part] of an hin [a quart] unto a ram, and a fourth [part] of an hin [a quart] unto a lamb: this [is] the burnt offering of every month throughout the months of the year.
And one kid of the goats for a sin offering unto the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) shall be offered, beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.
And in the fourteenth day of the first month [is] the Passover of the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate).
And in the fifteenth day of this month [is] the feast: seven days shall unleavened bread be eaten.
In the first day [shall be] an holy convocation; you 2f shall do no manner of servile work [in it]:

But you 2f shall offer a sacrifice made by fire [for] a burnt offering unto the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) ; two young bullocks, and one ram, and seven lambs of the first year: they shall be unto you without blemish:
And their meat offering [shall be of] flour mingled with oil: three tenth deals shall you 2f offer for a bullock, and two tenth deals for a ram;
A several tenth deal shall you i offer for every lamb, throughout the seven lambs:
And one goat [for] a sin offering, to make an atonement for you.
You 2f shall offer these beside the burnt offering in the morning, which [is] for a continual burnt offering.

After this manner you 2f shall offer daily, throughout the seven days, the meat of the sacrifice made by fire, of a soothing aroma unto the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) : it shall be offered beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.
And on the seventh day you 2f shall have an holy convocation; you 2f shall do no servile work.

Also in the day of the firstfruits, when you 2f bring a new meat offering unto the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) , after your weeks [be out] , you 2f shall have an holy convocation; you 2f shall do no servile work:
But you 2f shall offer the burnt offering for a soothing aroma unto the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) ; two young bullocks, one ram, seven lambs of the first year;
And their meat offering of flour mingled with oil, three tenth deals unto one bullock, two tenth deals unto one ram,
A several tenth deal unto one lamb, throughout the seven lambs;
[And] one kid of the goats, to make an atonement for you.
You 2f shall offer [them] beside the continual burnt offering, and his meat offering, (they shall be unto you without blemish) and their drink offerings.
And in the seventh month, on the first [day] of the month, you 2f shall have an holy convocation; you 2f shall do no servile work: it is a day of blowing the trumpets unto you.
And you 2f shall offer a burnt offering for a soothing aroma unto the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) ; one young bullock, one ram, [and] seven lambs of the first year without blemish:
And their meat offering [shall be of] flour mingled with oil, three tenth deals for a bullock, [and] two tenth deals for a ram,
And one tenth deal for one lamb, throughout the seven lambs:
And one kid of the goats [for] a sin offering, to make an atonement for you:

Beside the burnt offering of the month, and his meat offering, and the daily burnt offering, and his meat offering, and their drink offerings, according unto their manner, for a soothing aroma, a sacrifice made by fire unto the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate).
And you 2f shall have on the tenth [day] of this seventh month an holy convocation; and you 2f shall afflict your souls: you 2f shall not do any work [in it]:

But you 2f shall offer a burnt offering unto the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) [for] a soothing aroma; one young bullock, one ram, [and] seven lambs of the first year; they shall be unto you without blemish:
And their meat offering [shall be of] flour mingled with oil, three tenth deals to a bullock, [and] two tenth deals to one ram,
A several tenth deal for one lamb, throughout the seven lambs:
One kid of the goats [for] a sin offering; beside the sin offering of atonement, and the continual burnt offering, and the meat offering of it, and their drink offerings.

And on the fifteenth day of the seventh month you 2f shall have an holy convocation; you 2f shall do no servile work, and you 2f shall keep a feast unto the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) seven days:

And you 2f shall offer a burnt offering, a sacrifice made by fire, of a soothing aroma unto the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) ; thirteen young bullocks, two rams, [and] fourteen lambs of the first year; they shall be without blemish:
And their meat offering [shall be of] flour mingled with oil, three tenth deals unto every bullock of the thirteen bullocks, two tenth deals to each ram of the two rams,
And a several tenth deal to each lamb of the fourteen lambs:
And one kid of the goats [for] a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, his meat offering, and his drink offering.
And on the second day [you 2f shall offer] twelve young bullocks, two rams, fourteen lambs of the first year without spot:
And their meat offering and their drink offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, [shall be] according to their number, after the manner:
And one kid of the goats [for] a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, and the meat offering thereof, and their drink offerings.
And on the third day eleven bullocks, two rams, fourteen lambs of the first year without blemish;
And their meat offering and their drink offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, [shall be] according to their number, after the manner:
And one goat [for] a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, and his meat offering, and his drink offering.
And on the fourth day ten bullocks, two rams, [and] fourteen lambs of the first year without blemish:
Their meat offering and their drink offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, [shall be] according to their number, after the manner:
And one kid of the goats [for] a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, his meat offering, and his drink offering.
And on the fifth day nine bullocks, two rams, [and] fourteen lambs of the first year without spot:
And their meat offering and their drink offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, [shall be] according to their number, after the manner:
And one goat [for] a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, and his meat offering, and his drink offering.
And on the sixth day eight bullocks, two rams, [and] fourteen lambs of the first year without blemish:
And their meat offering and their drink offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, [shall be] according to their number, after the manner:
And one goat [for] a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, his meat offering, and his drink offering.
And on the seventh day seven bullocks, two rams, [and] fourteen lambs of the first year without blemish:
And their meat offering and their drink offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, [shall be] according to their number, after the manner:
And one goat [for] a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, his meat offering, and his drink offering.
On the eighth day you 2f shall have a solemn assembly: you 2f shall do no servile work [in it]:

But you 2f shall offer a burnt offering, a sacrifice made by fire, of a soothing aroma unto the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) : one bullock, one ram, seven lambs of the first year without blemish:
Their meat offering and their drink offerings for the bullock, for the ram, and for the lambs, [shall be] according to their number, after the manner:
And one goat [for] a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, and his meat offering, and his drink offering.

These [things] you 2f shall do unto the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) in your set feasts, beside your vows, and your freewill offerings, for your burnt offerings, and for your meat offerings, and for your drink offerings, and for your peace offerings.

And Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] told the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] according to all that the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) commanded Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters].

And Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] spoke unto the heads of the tribes concerning the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] , saying, This [is] the thing which the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) has commanded.

If a man vow a vow unto the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) , or swear an oath to bind his soul with a bond; he shall not break his word, he shall do according to all that proceeds out of his mouth.
If a woman also vow a vow unto the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) , and bind herself by a bond, [being] in her father’s house in her youth;

And her father hear her vow, and her bond which she has bound her soul, and her father shall hold his peace at her: then all her vows shall stand, and every bond which she has bound her soul shall stand.

But if her father disallow (to approve, commend, accept) her in the day that he hears; not any of her vows, or of her bonds which she has bound her soul, shall stand: and the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) shall forgive her, because her father disallow (to approve, commend, accept)ed her.
And if she had at all an husband, when she vowed, or uttered ought out of her lips, which she bound her soul;
And her husband heard [it,] and held his peace at her in the day that he heard [it] : then her vows shall stand, and her bonds which she bound her soul shall stand.

But if her husband disallow (to approve, commend, accept)ed her on the day that he heard [it] ; then he shall make her vow which she vowed, and that which she uttered with her lips, which she bound her soul, of none effect: and the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) shall forgive her.
But every vow of a widow, and of her that is divorced, which they have bound their souls, shall stand against her.
And if she vowed in her husband’s house, or bound her soul by a bond with an oath;
And her husband heard [it] , and held his peace at her, [and] disallow (to approve, commend, accept) ed her not: then all her vows shall stand, and every bond which she bound her soul shall stand.

But if her husband has utterly made them void on the day he heard [them; then] whatsoever proceeded out of her lips concerning her vows, or concerning the bond of her soul, shall not stand: her husband has made them void; and the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) shall forgive her.
Every vow, and every binding oath to afflict the soul, her husband may establish it, or her husband may make it void.

But if her husband altogether hold his peace at her from day to day; then he establishes all her vows, or all her bonds, which [are] upon her: he confirms them, because he held his peace at her in the day that he heard [them].
But if he shall any ways make them void after that he has heard [them] ; then he shall bear her iniquity.

These [are] the statutes, which the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) commanded Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] , between a man and his wife, between the father and his daughter, [being yet] in her youth in her father’s house.
And the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) spoke unto Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] , saying,
Avenge the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] of the Midyanim [Strife] : afterward shall you i be gathered unto you i people.

And Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] spoke unto the people, saying, Arm some of yourselves unto the war, and let them go against the Midyanim [Strife] , and avenge the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) of Midyan [Strife].
Of every tribe a thousand, throughout all the tribes of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] , shall you 2f send to the war.
So there were delivered out of the thousands of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] , a thousand of [every] tribe, twelve thousand armed for war.

And Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] sent them to the war, a thousand of [every] tribe, them and Pinchas [mouth of brass] the son of El’azar [God has helped] the priest, to the war, with the holy instruments, and the trumpets to blow in his hand.
And they warred against the Midyanim [Strife] , as the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) commanded Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] ; and they killed all the males.

And they killed the kings of Midyan [Strife] , beside the rest of them that were slain; [namely] , Evi [My Desire] , and Rekem [Variegation] , and Tzur [Rock] , and Hur [Liberty] , and Reva [Four] , five kings of Midyan [Strife] : Bil’am [Not of the People] also the son of B’or [Burning] they killed with the sword.

And the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] took [all] the women of Midyan [Strife] captives, and their little ones, and took the spoil (plunder; prey; booty) of all their cattle, and all their flocks, and all their goods.
And they burnt all their cities wherein they dwelt, and all their goodly castles, with fire.
And they took all the spoil (plunder; prey; booty) , and all the prey, [both] of men and of beasts.

And they brought the captives, and the prey, and the spoil (plunder; prey; booty) , unto Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] , and El’azar [God has helped] the priest, and unto the congregation of the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] , unto the camp at the plains of Mo’av [Seed of my Father] , which [are] by Yarden [Descender] [near] Yericho [Its Moon].
And Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] , and El’azar [God has helped] the priest, and all the princes of the congregation, went forth to meet them without the camp.
And Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] was exceedingly angry with the officers of the host, [with] the captains over thousands, and captains over hundreds, which came from the battle.
And Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] said unto them, Have you 2f saved all the women alive?

Behold, these caused the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] , through the counsel of Bil’am [Not of the People] , to commit trespass against the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) in the matter of P’or [Cleft (split hoof; an opening, break or split)] , and there was a plague among the congregation of the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate).
Now therefore kill every male among the little ones, and kill every woman that has known man by lying with him.
But all the women children, that have not known a man by lying with him, keep alive for yourselves.

And do you 2f abide without the camp seven days: whosoever has killed any person, and whosoever has touched any slain, purify [both] yourselves and your captives on the third day, and on the seventh day.
And purify all [your] clothing, and all that is made of skins, and all work of goats’ [hair] , and all things made of wood.

And El’azar [God has helped] the priest said unto the men of war which went to the battle, This [is] the ordinance of the law which the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) commanded Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters];
Only the gold, and the silver, the brass, the iron, the tin, and the lead,

Eveeverything that may abide the fire, you 2f shall make [it] go through the fire, and it shall be clean: nevertheless it shall be purified with the water of separation: and all that abides not the fire you 2f shall make go through the water.
And you 2f shall wash your clothes on the seventh day, and you 2f shall be clean, and afterward you 2f shall come into the camp.
And the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) spoke unto Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] , saying,
Take the sum of the prey that was taken, [both] of man and of beast, you i , and El’azar [God has helped] the priest, and the chief fathers of the congregation:
And divide the prey into two parts; between them that took the war upon them, who went out to battle, and between all the congregation:

And levy a tribute unto the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) of the men of war which went out to battle: one soul of five hundred, [both] of the persons, and of the beeves (cattle) , and of the asses, and of the sheep:
Take [it] of their half, and give it unto El’azar [God has helped] the priest, [for] an heave offering of the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate).

And of the people of Yisra’el’s [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] half, you i shall take one portion of fifty, of the persons, of the beeves (cattle) , of the asses, and of the flocks, of all manner of beasts, and give them unto the Levi’im (Levites) [Joined to] , which keep the charge of the tabernacle of the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate).
And Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] and El’azar [God has helped] the priest did as the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) commanded Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters].
And the booty, [being] the rest of the prey which the men of war had caught, was six hundred thousand and seventy thousand and five thousand sheep,
And threescore and twelve thousand beeves (cattle),
And threescore and one thousand asses,
And thirty and two thousand persons in all, of women that had not known man by lying with him.
And the half, [which was] the portion of them that went out to war, was in number three hundred thousand and seven and thirty thousand and five hundred sheep:
And the Lord-Yehōvah’s [Messiah Pre-Incarnate] tribute of the sheep was six hundred and threescore and fifteen.
And the beeves (cattle) [were] thirty and six thousand; of which the Lord-Yehōvah’s [Messiah Pre-Incarnate] tribute [was] threescore and twelve.
And the asses [were] thirty thousand and five hundred; of which the Lord-Yehōvah’s [Messiah Pre-Incarnate] tribute [was] threescore and one.
And the persons [were] sixteen thousand; of which the Lord-Yehōvah’s [Messiah Pre-Incarnate] tribute [was] thirty and two persons.

And Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] gave the tribute, [which was] the Lord-Yehōvah’s [Messiah Pre-Incarnate] heave offering, unto El’azar [God has helped] the priest, as the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) commanded Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters].
And of the people of Yisra’el’s [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] half, which Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] divided from the men that warred,
(Now the half [that pertained unto] the congregation was three hundred thousand and thirty thousand [and] seven thousand and five hundred sheep,
And thirty and six thousand beeves (cattle),
And thirty thousand asses and five hundred,
And sixteen thousand persons;)

Even of the people of Yisra’el’s [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] half, Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] took one portion of fifty, [both] of man and of beast, and gave them unto the Levi’im (Levites) [Joined to] , which kept the charge of the tabernacle of the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) ; as the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) commanded Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters].
And the officers which [were] over thousands of the host, the captains of thousands, and captains of hundreds, came near unto Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters]:
And they said unto Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] , You 1s servants have taken the sum of the men of war which [are] under our charge, and there lacks not one man of us.

We have therefore brought an oblation for the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) , what every man has gotten, of jewels of gold, chains, and bracelets, rings, earrings, and tablets (small, flat ornaments or jewelry) , to make an atonement for our souls before the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate).
And Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] and El’azar [God has helped] the priest took the gold of them, [even] all wrought jewels.

And all the gold of the offering that they offered up to the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) , of the captains of thousands, and of the captains of hundreds, was sixteen thousand seven hundred and fifty shekels.
( [For] the men of war had taken spoil (plunder; prey; booty) , every man for himself.)

And Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] and El’azar [God has helped] the priest took the gold of the captains of thousands and of hundreds, and brought it into the tabernacle of the congregation, [for] a memorial for the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] before the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate).

Now the children of Re’uven [Behold a Son] and the children of Gad [Good Fortune with Troublesome Effort] had a very great multitude of cattle: and when they saw the land of Ya’zer [Helped] , and the land of Gil’ad [Rocky Region] , that, behold, the place [was] a place for cattle;

The children of Gad [Good Fortune with Troublesome Effort] and the children of Re’uven [Behold a Son] came and spoke unto Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] , and to El’azar [God has helped] the priest, and unto the princes of the congregation, saying,

‘Atarot [Crowns] , and Divon [Wasting] , and Ya’zer [Helped] , and Nimrah [Pure] , and Heshbon [Stronghold] , and El’aleh [God is Ascending] , and S’vam [Fragrance] , and Nevo [Prophet] , and Be’on [Indwelling],
[Even] the country which the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) struck before the congregation of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God], [is] a land for cattle, and you i servants have cattle:
For what reason, said they, if we have found grace in you i sight, let this land be given unto you i servants for a possession, [and] bring us not over Yarden [Descender].

And Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] said unto the children of Gad [Good Fortune with Troublesome Effort] and to the children of Re’uven [Behold a Son] , Shall your brethren go to war, and shall you 2f sit here?
And wherefore discourage you 2f the heart of the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] from going over into the land which the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) has given them?
Thus did your fathers, when I sent them from Kadesh [Holy] -Barnea [Holy] to see the land.

For when they went up unto the valley of Eshkol [Cluster] , and saw the land, they discouraged the heart of the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] , that they should not go into the land which the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) had given them.
And the Lord-Yehōvah’s [Messiah Pre-Incarnate] anger was kindled the same time, and he swore, saying,

Surely none of the men that came up out of Mitzrayim [Egypt - The Narrow Place] , from twenty years old and upward, shall see the land which I swore unto Avraham [Exalted Father] , unto Yitz’khak [Laughter] , and unto Ya’akov [Heal of God] ; because they have not wholly followed me:

Save Kalev [Dog] the son of Y’funeh [He Will Face] the K’nizi [The Sons of Kenez] , and Y’hoshua [Yehovah is Salvation] the son of Nun [Posterity] : for they have wholly followed the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate).

And the Lord-Yehōvah’s [Messiah Pre-Incarnate] anger was kindled against Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] , and he made them wander in the wilderness forty years, until all the generation, that had done evil in the sight of the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) , was consumed.

And, behold, you 2f are risen up in your fathers’ stead, an increase of sinful men, to augment yet the fierce anger of the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) toward Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God].
For if you 2f turn away from after him, he will yet again leave them in the wilderness; and you 2f shall destroy all this people.
And they came near unto him, and said, We will build sheepfolds here for our cattle, and cities for our little ones:

But we ourselves will go ready armed before the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] , until we have brought them unto their place: and our little ones shall dwell in the fenced cities because of the inhabitants of the land.
We will not return unto our houses, until the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] have inherited every man his inheritance.
For we will not inherit with them on yonder side Yarden [Descender] , or forward; because our inheritance is fallen to us on this side Yarden [Descender] eastward.
And Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] said unto them, If you 2f will do this thing, if you 2f will go armed before the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) to war,
And will go all of you armed over Yarden [Descender] before the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) , until he has driven out his enemies from before him,

And the land be subdued before the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) : then afterward you 2f shall return, and be guiltless before the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) , and before Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] ; and this land shall be your possession before the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate).
But if you 2f will not do so, behold, you 2f have sinned against the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) : and be sure your sin will find you out.
Build you cities for your little ones, and folds for your sheep; and do that which has proceeded out of your mouth.

And the children of Gad [Good Fortune with Troublesome Effort] and the children of Re’uven [Behold a Son] spoke unto Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] , saying, You 1s servants will do as my lord commands.
Our little ones, our wives, our flocks, and all our cattle, shall be there in the cities of Gil’ad [Rocky Region]:
But you i servants will pass over, every man armed for war, before the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) to battle, as my lord says.

So concerning them Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] commanded El’azar [God has helped] the priest, and Y’hoshua [Yehovah is Salvation] the son of Nun [Posterity] , and the chief fathers of the tribes of the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God]:

And Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] said unto them, If the children of Gad [Good Fortune with Troublesome Effort] and the children of Re’uven [Behold a Son] will pass with you over Yarden [Descender] , every man armed to battle, before the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) , and the land shall be subdued before you; then you 2f shall give them the land of Gil’ad [Rocky Region] for a possession:
But if they will not pass over with you armed, they shall have possessions among you in the land of Kena’an [Merchant].

And the children of Gad [Good Fortune with Troublesome Effort] and the children of Re’uven [Behold a Son] answered, saying, As the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) has said unto you i servants, so will we do.
We will pass over armed before the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) into the land of Kena’an [Merchant] , that the possession of our inheritance on this side Yarden [Descender] [may be] ours.

And Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] gave unto them, [even] to the children of Gad [Good Fortune with Troublesome Effort] , and to the children of Re’uven [Behold a Son] , and unto half the tribe of M’nasheh [Causing to Forget] the son of Yosef [(God) He Shall Add] , the kingdom of Sichon [Warrior] king of the Emori [Highlanders] , and the kingdom of ‘Og [Long-necked] king of Bashan [Fruitful] , the land, with the cities thereof in the coasts, [even] the cities of the country round about.
And the children of Gad [Good Fortune with Troublesome Effort] built Divon [Wasting] , and ‘Atarot [Crowns] , and ‘Aeo’er [Ruins],
And ‘Artrot-Shofan [Crowns in Their Rapine] , and Ya’zer [Helped] , and Yogbehah [Lofty],
And Beit-Nimrah [House of the Leopard] , and Beit-Haran [mountaineer] [House of the Joyful Shouter] , fenced cities: and folds for sheep.
And the children of Re’uven [Behold a Son] built Heshbon [Stronghold] , and El’aleh [God is Ascending] , and Kiryatayim [Two Cities],
And Nevo [Prophet] , and Ba’al-M’on [lord of the Habitation], (their names being changed,) and Sivmah [Fragrance] : and gave other names unto the cities which they built.
And the children of Makhir [Sold] the son of M’nasheh [Causing to Forget] went to Gil’ad [Rocky Region] , and took it, and dispossessed the Emori [Rebellious Highlanders] which [was] in it.
And Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] gave Gil’ad [Rocky Region] unto Makhir [Sold] the son of M’nasheh [Causing to Forget] ; and he dwelt in it.
And Ya’ir [He Enlightens] the son of M’nasheh [Causing to Forget] went and took the small to (to do entirely, do wholly)wns thereof, and called them Havot-Ya’ir [Villages of the Enlighteners].
And Novach [Barking] went and took K’nat [Possession] , and the villages thereof, and called it Novach [Barking] , after his own name.

These [are] the journeys of the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] , which went forth out of the land of Mitzrayim [Egypt - The Narrow Place] with their armies under the hand of Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] and Aharon [Bright, Very High].

And Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] wrote their goings out according to their journeys by the commandment of the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) : and these [are] their journeys according to their goings out.

And they departed from Ra’amses in the first month, on the fifteenth day of the first month; on the morrow after the Passover the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] went out with an high hand in the sight of all the Mitzri.
For the Mitzri buried all [their] firstborn, which the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) had smitten among them: upon their gods also the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) executed judgments.
And the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] removed from Ra’amses, and pitched in Sukkot [Booths].
And they departed from Sukkot [Booths] , and pitched in ‘Eitam [Lair of Wild Beasts] [with them: their plowshare], which [is] in the edge of the wilderness.

And they removed from ‘Eitam [Lair of Wild Beasts] [with them: their plowshare], and turned again unto Pi-Hachirot [The Place where the Sedge Grows] , which [is] before Ba’al-Tz’fon [Lord of the North] : and they pitched before Migdol [Tower].

And they departed from before Pi-Hachirot [The Place where the Sedge Grows] , and passed through the midst of the sea into the wilderness, and went three days’ journey in the wilderness of ‘Eitam [Lair of Wild Beasts] [with them: their plowshare], and pitched in Marah [Bitterness].
And they removed from Marah [Bitterness] , and came unto Eilim [Palms] : and in Eilim [Palms] [were] twelve fountains of water, and threescore and ten palm trees; and they pitched there.
And they removed from Eilim [Palms] , and encamped by the Red sea.
And they removed from the Red sea, and encamped in the wilderness of Sin.
And they took their journey out of the wilderness of Sin, and encamped in Dofkah [Knocking].
And they departed from Dofkah [Knocking] , and encamped in Alush [I Will Knead (Bread)].
And they removed from Alush [I Will Knead (Bread)] , and encamped at Refidim [Resting Places] , where was no water for the people to drink.
And they departed from Refidim [Resting Places] , and pitched in the wilderness of Sinai.
And they removed from the desert of Sinai, and pitched at Kivrot-HaTa’avah [Graves of Lust].
And they departed from Kivrot-HaTa’avah [Graves of Lust] , and encamped at Hatzerot [A Place in the Wilderness].
And they departed from Hatzerot [A Place in the Wilderness] , and pitched in Ritmah [Health].
And they departed from Ritmah [Health] , and pitched at Rimmon [Pomegranate] -Peretz [Pomegranate of the Breach (breaking forth; a break; opening, inlet)].
And they departed from Rimmon [Pomegranate] -Peretz [Pomegranate of the Breach (breaking forth; a break; opening, inlet)], and pitched in Livnah [Pavement].
And they removed from Livnah [Pavement] , and pitched at Rissah [Ruin].
And they journeyed from Rissah [Ruin] , and pitched in K’helah [Assembly].
And they went from K’helah [Assembly] , and pitched in mount Shefer [Beauty].
And they removed from mount Shefer [Beauty] , and encamped in Haradah [Fear].
And they removed from Haradah [Fear] , and pitched in Mak’helot [Place of Assembly].
And they removed from Mak’helot [Place of Assembly] , and encamped at Tachat [Station].
And they departed from Tachat [Station] , and pitched at Terach [Station].
And they removed from Terach [Station] , and pitched in Mitkah [Sweetness].
And they went from Mitkah [Sweetness] , and pitched in HaShmonah [Fatness].
And they departed from HaShmonah [Fatness] , and encamped at Moserot [Bonds].
And they departed from Moserot [Bonds] , and pitched in B’nei-Ya’akan [Sons of Twisting].
And they removed from B’nei-Ya’akan [Sons of Twisting] , and encamped at Hor-HaGidgad [Cavern of Gidgad].
And they went from Hor-HaGidgad [Cavern of Gidgad] , and pitched in Yotvatah [Pleasantness].
And they removed from Yotvatah [Pleasantness] , and encamped at Avronah [Passage].
And they departed from Avronah [Passage] , and encamped at ‘Etzyon-Gever [Backbone of a Man].
And they removed from ‘Etzyon-Gever [Backbone of a Man] , and pitched in the wilderness of Tzin [Flat] , which [is] Kadesh [Holy].
And they removed from Kadesh [Holy] , and pitched in mount Hor [Mountain Peak] , in the edge of the land of Edom [Red].

And Aharon [Bright, Very High] the priest went up into mount Hor [Mountain Peak] at the commandment of the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) , and died there, in the fortieth year after the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] were come out of the land of Mitzrayim [Egypt - The Narrow Place] , in the first [day] of the fifth month.
And Aharon [Bright, Very High] [was] an hundred and twenty and three years old when he died in mount Hor [Mountain Peak].
And king ‘Arad [A Wild Ass] the Kena’ani [Merchants] , which dwelt in the south in the land of Kena’an [Merchant] , heard of the coming of the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God].
And they departed from mount Hor [Mountain Peak] , and pitched in Tzalmonah [Shady].
And they departed from Tzalmonah [Shady] , and pitched in Punon [Darkness].
And they departed from Punon [Darkness] , and pitched in Ovot [Waterskins].
And they departed from Ovot [Waterskins] , and pitched in ‘Iyei-Ha’avarim [Ruins of Regions Beyond] , in the border of Mo’av [Seed of my Father].
And they departed from ‘Ee’yim [Ruins] , and pitched in Divon-Gad [Wasting].
And they removed from Divon-Gad [Wasting] , and encamped in ‘‘Almon [concealed] -Divlatayim [Concealing the Two Cakes].
And they removed from ‘‘Almon [concealed] -Divlatayim [Concealing the Two Cakes] , and pitched in the mountains of ‘Avarim [Regions Beyond] , before Nevo [Prophet].
And they departed from the mountains of ‘Avarim [Regions Beyond] , and pitched in the plains of Mo’av [Seed of my Father] by Yarden [Descender] [near] Yericho [Its Moon].
And they pitched by Yarden [Descender] , from Beit-HaYeshimot [House of the Desolation] [even] unto Avel-HaSheetim [Meadow of Acacias] in the plains of Mo’av [Seed of my Father].
And the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) spoke unto Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] in the plains of Mo’av [Seed of my Father] by Yarden [Descender] [near] Yericho [Its Moon] , saying,
Speak unto the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] , and say unto them, When you 2f are passed over Yarden [Descender] into the land of Kena’an [Merchant];
Then you 2f shall drive out all the inhabitants of the land from before you, and destroy all their pictures, and destroy all their molten images, and quite pluck down all their high places:
And you 2f shall dispossess [the inhabitants] of the land, and dwell in it: for I have given you the land to possess it.

And you 2f shall divide the land by lot for an inheritance among your families: [and] to the more you 2f shall give the more inheritance, and to the fewer you 2f shall give the less inheritance: every man’s [inheritance] shall be in the place where his lot falls; according to the tribes of your fathers you 2f shall inherit.

But if you 2f will not drive out the inhabitants of the land from before you; then it shall come to pass, that those which you 2f let remain of them [shall be] pricks in your eyes, and thorns in your sides, and shall vex you in the land wherein you 2f dwell.
Moreover it shall come to pass, [that] I shall do unto you, as I thought to do unto them.
And the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) spoke unto Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] , saying,

Command the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] , and say unto them, When you 2f come into the land of Kena’an [Merchant] ; (this [is] the land that shall fall unto you for an inheritance, [even] the land of Kena’an [Merchant] with the coasts thereof:)
Then your south quarter shall be from the wilderness of Tzin [Flat] along by the coast of Edom [Red] , and your south border shall be the outmost coast of the salt sea eastward:

And your border shall turn from the south to the ascent of ‘Akrabbim [Ascent of Scorpions] , and pass on to Tzin [Flat] : and the going forth thereof shall be from the south to Kadesh [Holy] -Barnea [Holy] , and shall go on to Hatzar-Adar [Enclosure of Glory] , and pass on to ‘Atzmon [Strong]:
And the border shall fetch a compass (go around, encircle; encompass) from ‘Atzmon [Strong] unto the river of Mitzrayim [Egypt - The Narrow Place] , and the goings out of it shall be at the sea.
And [as for] the western border, you 2f shall even have the great sea for a border: this shall be your west border.
And this shall be your north border: from the great sea you 2f shall point out for you mount Hor [Mountain Peak]:
From mount Hor [Mountain Peak] you 2f shall point out [your border] unto the entrance of Hamat [Fortress] ; and the goings forth of the border shall be to Tz’dad [Mountain Side]:
And the border shall go on to Zifon [Fragrance] , and the goings out of it shall be at Hatzar-’Einan [Villiage of Fountains] : this shall be your north border.
And you 2f shall point out your east border from Hatzar-’Einan [Village of Fountains] to Sh’fam [Bald]:

And the coast shall go down from Sh’fam [Bald] to Rivlah [Fertility] , on the east side of ‘Ayin [Spring] ; and the border shall descend, and shall reach unto the side of the sea of Kinneret [Harps] eastward:
And the border shall go down to Yarden [Descender] , and the goings out of it shall be at the salt sea: this shall be your land with the coasts thereof round about.

And Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] commanded the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] , saying, This [is] the land which you 2f shall inherit by lot, which the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) commanded to give unto the nine tribes, and to the half tribe:

For the tribe of the children of Re’uven [Behold a Son] according to the house of their fathers, and the tribe of the children of Gad [Good Fortune with Troublesome Effort] according to the house of their fathers, have received [their inheritance] ; and half the tribe of M’nasheh [Causing to Forget] have received their inheritance:
The two tribes and the half tribe have received their inheritance on this side Yarden [Descender] [near] Yericho [Its Moon] eastward, toward the sunrising.
And the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) spoke unto Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] , saying,
These [are] the names of the men which shall divide the land unto you: El’azar [God has helped] the priest, and Y’hoshua [Yehovah is Salvation] the son of Nun [Posterity].
And you 2f shall take one prince of every tribe, to divide the land by inheritance.
And the names of the men [are] these: Of the tribe of Y’hudah [Let Him (God) Be Praised] , Kalev [Dog] the son of Y’funeh [He Will Face].
And of the tribe of the children of Shim’on [he who hears] , Sh’mu’el [His Name is El] the son of Ammihud [People of Magesty].
Of the tribe of Binyamin [Son of the Right Hand/Strength] , Elidad [My God Has Loved] the son of Kislon [Confidence].
And the prince of the tribe of the children of Dan [Judge] , Buki [Wasting] the son of Yogli [He is Exiled].

The prince of the children of Yosef [(God) He Shall Add] , for the tribe of the children of M’nasheh [Causing to Forget] , Hani’el [Favoured of God] the son of Efod [A (Special) Belt (wrapped around)].
And the prince of the tribe of the children of Efrayim [Doubly Fruitful] , K’mu’el [Raised of God] the son of Shiftan [Judicial].
And the prince of the tribe of the children of Z’vulun [Glorious Dwelling Place] , Elitzafan [My God has Protected] the son of Parnakh [Delicate].
And the prince of the tribe of the children of Yissakhar [There Is Recompense] , Palti’el [God Delivers] the son of ‘Azan [Very Strong].
And the prince of the tribe of the children of Asher [Happy] , Achihud [Brother of Majesty] the son of Shlomi [Peaceful].
And the prince of the tribe of the children of Naftali [My Wrestling] , P’dah’el [Ransomed by God] the son of Ammihud [People of Magesty].
These [are they] whom the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) commanded to divide the inheritance unto the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] in the land of Kena’an [Merchant].
And the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) spoke unto Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] in the plains of Mo’av [Seed of my Father] by Yarden [Descender] [near] Yericho [Its Moon] , saying,

Command the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] , that they give unto the Levi’im (Levites) [Joined to] of the inheritance of their possession cities to dwell in; and you 2f shall give [also] unto the Levi’im (Levites) [Joined to] suburbs for the cities round about them.
And the cities shall they have to dwell in; and the suburbs of them shall be for their cattle, and for their goods, and for all their beasts.
And the suburbs of the cities, which you 2f shall give unto the Levi’im (Levites) [Joined to], [shall reach] from the wall of the city and outward a thousand cubits round about.

And you 2f shall measure from without the city on the east side two thousand cubits, and on the south side two thousand cubits, and on the west side two thousand cubits, and on the north side two thousand cubits; and the city [shall be] in the midst: this shall be to them the suburbs of the cities.

And among the cities which you 2f shall give unto the Levi’im (Levites) [Joined to] [there shall be] six cities for refuge, which you 2f shall appoint for the manslayer, that he may flee there: and to them you 2f shall add forty and two cities.
[So] all the cities which you 2f shall give to the Levi’im (Levites) [Joined to] [shall be] forty and eight cities: them [shall you 2f give] with their suburbs.

And the cities which you 2f shall give [shall be] of the possession of the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] : from [them that have] many you 2f shall give many; but from [them that have] few you 2f shall give few: every one shall give of his cities unto the Levi’im (Levites) [Joined to] according to his inheritance which he inherits.
And the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) spoke unto Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] , saying,
Speak unto the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] , and say unto them, When you 2f be come over Yarden [Descender] into the land of Kena’an [Merchant];
Then you 2f shall appoint you cities to be cities of refuge for you; that the slayer may flee there, which kills any person at unawares.
And they shall be unto you cities for refuge from the avenger; that the manslayer die not, until he stand before the congregation in judgment.
And of these cities which you 2f shall give six cities shall you 2f have for refuge.
You 2f shall give three cities on this side Yarden [Descender] , and three cities shall you 2f give in the land of Kena’an [Merchant], [which] shall be cities of refuge.

These six cities shall be a refuge, [both] for the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] , and for the stranger, and for the sojourner among them: that every one that kills any person unawares may flee there.
And if he strike him with an instrument of iron, so that he die, he [is] a murderer: the murderer shall surely be put to death.
And if he strike him with throwing a stone, which he may die, and he die, he [is] a murderer: the murderer shall surely be put to death.
Or [if] he strike him with an hand weapon of wood, which he may die, and he die, he [is] a murderer: the murderer shall surely be put to death.
The revenger of blood himself shall slay the murderer: when he meets him, he shall slay him.
But if he thrust him of hatred, or hurl at him by laying of wait, that he die;

Or in hatred (being an enemy) strike him with his hand, that he die: he that struck [him] shall surely be put to death; [for] he [is] a murderer: the revenger of blood shall slay the murderer, when he meets him.
But if he thrust him suddenly without hatred (being an enemy) , or have cast upon him anything without laying of wait,
Or with any stone, which a man may die, seeing [him] not, and cast [it] upon him, that he die, and [was] not his enemy, neither sought his harm:
Then the congregation shall judge between the slayer and the revenger of blood according to these judgments:

And the congregation shall deliver the slayer out of the hand of the revenger of blood, and the congregation shall restore him to the city of his refuge, to which he was fled: and he shall abide in it unto the death of the High Priest, which was anointed with the holy oil.
But if the slayer shall at any time come without the border of the city of his refuge, to which he was fled;
And the revenger of blood find him without the borders of the city of his refuge, and the revenger of blood kill the slayer; he shall not be guilty of blood:
Because he should have remained in the city of his refuge until the death of the High Priest: but after the death of the High Priest the slayer shall return into the land of his possession.
So these [things] shall be for a statute of judgment unto you throughout your generations in all your dwellings.
Whoso kills any person, the murderer shall be put to death by the mouth of witnesses: but one witness shall not testify against any person [to cause him] to die.
Moreover you 2f shall take no satisfaction for the life of a murderer, which [is] guilty of death: but he shall be surely put to death.
And you 2f shall take no satisfaction for him that is fled to the city of his refuge, that he should come again to dwell in the land, until the death of the priest.
So you 2f shall not pollute the land wherein you 2f [are] : for blood it defiles the land: and the land cannot be cleansed of the blood that is shed in it, but by the blood of him that shed it.
Defile not therefore the land which you 2f shall inhabit, wherein I dwell: for I the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) dwell among the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God].

And the chief fathers of the families of the children of Gil’ad [Rocky Region] , the son of Makhir [Sold] , the son of M’nasheh [Causing to Forget] , of the families of the sons of Yosef [(God) He Shall Add] , came near, and spoke before Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] , and before the princes, the chief fathers of the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God]:

And they said, The Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) commanded my lord to give the land for an inheritance by lot to the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] : and my lord was commanded by the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) to give the inheritance of Tz’lof’chad [First-Born] our brother unto his daughters.

And if they be married to any of the sons of the [other] tribes of the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] , then shall their inheritance be taken from the inheritance of our fathers, and shall be put to the inheritance of the tribe whereunto they are received: so shall it be taken from the lot of our inheritance.

And when the jubilee of the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] shall be, then shall their inheritance be put unto the inheritance of the tribe whereunto they are received: so shall their inheritance be taken away from the inheritance of the tribe of our fathers.

And Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] commanded the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] according to the word of the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) , saying, The tribe of the sons of Yosef [(God) He Shall Add] has said well.

This [is] the thing which the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) does command concerning the daughters of Tz’lof’chad [First-Born] , saying, Let them marry to whom they think best; only to the family of the tribe of their father shall they marry.

So shall not the inheritance of the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] remove from tribe to tribe: for every one of the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] shall keep himself to the inheritance of the tribe of his fathers.

And every daughter, that possesses an inheritance in any tribe of the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] , shall be wife unto one of the family of the tribe of her father, that the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] may enjoy every man the inheritance of his fathers.

Neither shall the inheritance remove from [one] tribe to another tribe; but every one of the tribes of the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] shall keep himself to his own inheritance.
Even as the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) commanded Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] , so did the daughters of Tz’lof’chad [First-Born]:

For Machlah [Disease] , Tirtzah [Favorable] , and Hoglah [Partidge] , and Machlah [Queen] , and No’ah [Motion] , the daughters of Tz’lof’chad [First-Born] , were married unto their father’s brothers’ sons:

[And] they were married into the families of the sons of M’nasheh [Causing to Forget] the son of Yosef [(God) He Shall Add] , and their inheritance remained in the tribe of the family of their father.

These [are] the commandments and the judgments, which the Lord-Yehōvah (Messiah Pre-Incarnate) commanded by the hand of Moshe [He Who Draws Out Of The Waters] unto the people of Yisra’el [He Holds Onto The Heel Of God] in the plains of Mo’av [Seed of my Father] by Yarden [Descender] [near] Yericho [Its Moon].
